headline: Consumers Energy Provides Assistance to Help Michigan's Seniors Stay Safe and Warm This Winter
summary: As Michigan prepares for another cold winter, Consumers Energy is highlighting energy bill assistance and safeguards for seniors. Those include shut-off protection and $4 monthly electric bill credits that are available to most households headed by someone age 65 or older.
